content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --DTC
      operator: empty
    - name: --DY
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.289
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: When a domain belongs to the Findings General Observation Class, and
  the domain is one in which data are usually collected at multiple study days, at
  least --DTC or --DY must be populated.
Outcome:
  Message: Neither --DTC nor --DY is populated
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '289'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: In the Findings observation class, where data are
                  usually collected at multiple study days, either --DTC or --DY must
                  be used.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: '4.4'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - BW
      - BG
      - CL
      - FW
      - LB
      - OM
      - PM
      - PC
      - VS
      - EG
      - CV
      - RE

json.Description: When a domain belongs to the Findings General Observation Class, and the domain is one in which data are usually collected at multiple study days, at least --DTC or --DY must be populated.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: In the Findings observation class, where data are usually collected at multiple study days, either --DTC or --DY must be used.
